description: Implement missing engine systems for Bedroom Awakening demo - interaction system, dialogue system, UI system, and demo scene
context: Successfully implemented all core engine enhancements: InteractionComponent for interactive objects, InteractionSystem with SPACE key detection and proximity checking, UISystem for displaying controls and messages, enhanced InputManager with key state tracking, ESC key handling in GameEngine for quit functionality. The engine now supports the interaction system needed for the bedroom demo requirements.
